topics.body:
Ugh... I'm reading the hate korrasami is getting and it's pretty apparent how the anti-glbt movement is "evolving".

If someone disliked the ship cause it wasn't their otp or they thought it was rushed that's completely different.

What I mean by this is that 90% of the negative comments in a nutshell are "I'm not homophobic, *but* <immediately says something homophobic>".  It's like how modern day *actual* racists whenever they're talking about their beliefs pre-phase what they're saying with "I'm not racist, but".  Just cause you say the phrase "I'm not <x>" doesn't mean you're not; if someone were to say the phrase "I'm not homophobic, I just think gays need to be imprisoned" doesn't mean you're not homophobic.  If you're wondering where I got that analogy from years ago when I was christian we had a missionary come from one of the countries where homosexuality is punished by death and he kept saying stuff along the lines of "I'm not against gays; I just think they should be in prison".

Just cause someone says they aren't doesn't mean they aren't.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
